user.name: 宝玉

fullText: 最近，AI 圈子里有两个事值得关注：一个是 GPT-4o 推出了新的画图模型，另一个是豆包升级了“边搜边想”功能。这两个例子都指向了一个正在越来越被人接受和认同的 AI 新范式——“模型即产品”。它听起来有点抽象，但其实可能会影响未来 AI https://t.co/DuNmgmTw4n

user.name: Gary Marcus
user.description: Built two AI companies, wrote six books, tried to warn you about a lot of things.

fullText: “Isn’t it amazing how token prediction can fool people who don’t understand AI into imagining intelligence where all there is regurgitation and style transfer?” https://t.co/LhA5XiEM7r

SaaS companies competed by passing efficiencies to customers by reducing prices.

AI companies will do this by expending more compute per query.

It’s a mistake to think tokens getting cheaper means lower prices or better margins.
